clpp::detail::parameters_redundancy_checker

Detailed Description

Parameter's redundancy checker.

Check redundancy of inputed parameters. Assumed that each of the parameters can be inputed only once, so quantity of inputed parameters cannot be greater than quantity of registered parameters.
